notifications.email-ns: This browser doesn't support it yet.

hero.desc: Hello. I'm Patrick, a frontend & mobile developer with 3 years of commercial development experience. I specialize in creating modern responsive websites, browser extensions, progressive web applications, mobile apps, client-side code optimization, and much more. I enjoy writing code from scratch but can also provide HTML, CSS, and JS packaged into a modern web framework. I create high-quality products through a proven software development process.
hero.subtitle: Follow me

dbbetb-e46b8r8b54e3f.title: IGPlus
dbbetb-e46b8r8b54e3f.desc: An Instagram extension that allows users to disable Reels, Stories, recommendations, vanity metrics, and customize themes, fonts, and more. Has ~10,000 active users across all platforms.

db64-be4dbf8r8b54e3f.title: GPT 3.5 / 4 Automation CLI Tool
db64-be4dbf8r8b54e3f.desc: A tool for automated posts generation using GPT 3.5 / 4. It offers combining post chunks, post validations, paraphraser for each one / random strings (to avoid plagiarism and AI detection), Unsplash API relative images fetching and multiple OpenAI accounts.

db64-betnrwnrt45v4gn.title: LichessHelper
db64-betnrwnrt45v4gn.desc: Extension for Lichess that adds new themes, pieces, boards, fonts, and features such as disabling popups, modern layout, coordinates on each square, and many more. Available for Google Chrome, Firefox, and MS Edge.

db64-be46bmyr8b54egf.title: ChessHelper for Chess.com
db64-be46bmyr8b54egf.desc: It has almost the same features as LichessHelper, but for Chess.com. Has ~4,500 active users across all platforms. Most of the pieces and boards were created by me, while others are sourced from the web under the GNU/CC0 licenses.

db64-be46b8rht53f.title: Parallax Gallery
db64-be46b8rht53f.desc: Gallery project with a smooth parallax effect. Lightweight and efficient, comprising only ~100 lines of code.

db64-rt46b8r8b543f.title: SpoPlus for Spotify
db64-rt46b8r8b543f.desc: Adds customization and personalization to the web-version of Spotify. Such as: new themes, fonts, hiding popups, and more. Has ~12,000 active users across all the platforms.

db64-betnrgn-ntrt44v4gn.title: Chess in Browser
db64-betnrgn-ntrt44v4gn.desc: Chess game in the browser. Developed using OOP, TypeScript, with mobile support. Currently implemented features include pieces capture, main pieces move rules, and en passant. In progress are short and long castle, checks, checkmate, kings' single square gap, and more.

db64-be46b8r8b54e3f.title: TrainingPeaks
db64-be46b8r8b54e3f.desc: Personal training PWA with as three main resources ‚Äì plans, daily feelings and workouts. Each section is customizable, allowing users to easily drag-n-drop training sessions from one day to another. It aslo provides weekly statistics.

dbf0-beqr56b8r8brbe5l.title: OnlineStats.com
dbf0-beqr56b8r8brbe5l.desc: Service for collecting and reviewing users publicly shared online status in Telegram Messenger. Utilizes JWT Auth, bizcharts charts, final-form for forms. Also it offers i18n locales and a dark theme mode.

dbf0-beqr0b890eq9r8b98.title: Music App
dbf0-beqr0b890eq9r8b98.desc: ReactJS & Redux Music player. Has mobile version, uses localStorage. Utilizes AudioSession Api, which allows browser features, such as hotkey buttons (Next/Prev, album preview).

fbd07wavab0987erab709adb.title: Anydo
fbd07wavab0987erab709adb.desc: To-do list application, utilizes all the CRUD operations (add, update, read or delete ‚Äì for any task), and aslo has such features, as sorting by Tags, JWT Auth and mobile version.

fadb0978a8f90b7986da0968.title: Twitter Clone
fadb0978a8f90b7986da0968.desc: This project uses final-form validation for form handling, allows posting tweets, has routings for both guests and logged-in users, and tweets fetching.

0879fbd9078adfb0a7dfb908.title: Nolk Landing Page
0879fbd9078adfb0a7dfb908.desc: Responsive template with SVG animations and a simple 3-step email form. Built on JS, utilizes Gulp as the main task runner.

a79e04bc-4bf4-4d23-b23d-c2c8221a6180.title: Matro UI
a79e04bc-4bf4-4d23-b23d-c2c8221a6180.desc: üëÅÔ∏è Highly optimized UI Components in one, tiny package. It's a simple, modular library that provides all essential components for any React project.

d0c97369-e345-4759-a619-0520d4e58274.title: docusaurus-plugin-fix-react
d0c97369-e345-4759-a619-0520d4e58274.desc: Fixes the issue where node package / exported component uses "from react" import, so webpack resolves it not from global node_modules/react but instead from the package directory.

8fc7da5b-799a-4415-b0ef-f2633b0e55a6.title: Amazon Research Tool
8fc7da5b-799a-4415-b0ef-f2633b0e55a6.desc: Helps users to discover Amazon product info, find best prices, leverage SEO keywords, locate top suppliers with Reverse ASIN, and more. Available on the Google Chrome Store and Firefox Add-ons.

sbbetb-l43b8r4b54e3f.title: NorithalCV Pure
sbbetb-l43b8r4b54e3f.desc: Wordpress theme, designed for professionals and creatives who need a snappy, lightweight solution to showcase their skills and achievements. Whether you‚Äôre creating a CV, portfolio, or minimalist blog, this theme is an excellent choice.

6034b3c5-a218-4169-a807-e0684d40213f.title: DoHabbit App
6034b3c5-a218-4169-a807-e0684d40213f.desc: Open-source habits tracker for both iOS and Android. Designed to help users stay consistent and improve their daily routine. It makes tracking and achieving progress easier and way more engaging.

3aa5099f-23ad-42a7-a545-340365938388.title: Memento. - Minimalistic Homepage
3aa5099f-23ad-42a7-a545-340365938388.desc: Open-source, lightweight, and customizable start page extension for browsers. Features include: uploading custom backgrounds, selecting which one to display, and drag-and-drop toolbar widgets.

d0c97369-e345-4759-a619-0520d4e58275.title: react-native-drag-n-drop
d0c97369-e345-4759-a619-0520d4e58275.desc: A scrollable React Native drag-n-drop library that does not use FlatList, which sometimes cause framedrop issues on Android. Built with react-native-reanimated and react-native-gesture-handler. Supports custom item rendering, grips for drag initiation, and more.
